councillor.keyposts: Deputy Leader of the Council & the Conservative Group

councillor.keyposts: Leader of the Council & the Conservative Group

surgerydetails.line1: There is no set surgery for this ward but contact by email, telephone or letter to make an appointment.

I will be holding regular ‘street surgeries’ on Saturday and Sunday afternoons, relevant streets will be notified by leaflet. At all other times please contact me by email, text or telephone to arrange an appointment. Further information on ‘street surgery’ dates are posted on the Canterbury and Whitstable Labour Party website: http://canterburylabour.org.uk
